entry.title: Wednesday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then rain or snow changing to snow this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 near noon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Wednesday 04 May 2016

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Wednesday 04 May 2016
